attributes.action: No Vaccine Mandate for NHS staff now we know that vaccinated transmit Covid-19.
attributes.additional_details: It will create unsafe pressure on healthcare providers in the UK whilst being very unlikely to save any lives.
attributes.background: Remove requirement for healthcare staff to be vaccinated now we know that the vaccinated catch and transmit Covid-19.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598996
